wings.description: The Crime Wing handles investigation of criminal cases, ensures justice to victims, and works on reducing repeat offences. Specialized units deal with theft, assault, homicide, and organized crime.
wings.title: Crime Wing

wings.description: This wing manages road safety, regulates vehicle movement, and controls congestion in towns. They conduct awareness drives and enforce traffic laws to prevent road accidents.
wings.title: Traffic Wing

wings.description: Responsible for maintaining public peace and order, this wing supervises daily patrolling, deployment during events, and ensures swift response during emergencies and protests.
wings.title: Law & Order Wing

wings.description: The Cybercrime unit investigates digital frauds, online harassment, financial scams, and identity theft. It works closely with cyber forensic experts and educates citizens on safe internet practices.
wings.title: Cyber Crime Wing

wings.description: This wing handles cases related to women safety, domestic violence, sexual harassment, and child abuse. Dedicated women officers ensure timely counselling, legal support, and protection services.
wings.title: Women Protection Cell

wings.description: Special Branch handles intelligence gathering, VIP security arrangements, background verifications, and monitoring of sensitive issues to prevent any threats to district security.
wings.title: Special Branch

wings.description: The Anti-Narcotics Wing curbs the menace of drug abuse, illegal cultivation, storage, and smuggling of narcotics and psychotropic substances.
wings.title: Anti-Narcotics Wing

wings.description: Provides armed support during emergencies, law & order situations, VIP bandobust, and other high-risk duties.
wings.title: Armed Reserve Wing

wings.description: This wing conducts regular training programs for police personnel, enhancing skills in investigation, technology usage, law, and public relations.
wings.title: Training Wing

wings.description: The Bomb Detection & Disposal (BD) Wing is responsible for handling explosives, detecting suspicious materials, and ensuring public safety during bomb threats or special events.
wings.title: BD Wing
